entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect trim analysis warning for base method implementing interface #97676
  • OrderByDescending(...).First() changed which item is getting returned #97668
  • TypeLoadException on minimal, correct and compiling program #97667
    8.0.x
  • Crash related to GC: help interpreting stacktrace #97661
  • [WASI] Best pattern for Native DLL Pinvokes using wasi workload? #97656
  • Flag stale PR validation builds #97653
  • [wasm][mt] Debugger test is using blocking calls in JS interop thread #97652
    9.0.0
  • Scalability of System.Text.Json #97649
  • Usersecrets in Docker container don't work when USER app set #97647
  • System.IO.Ports - SerialDataReceivedEventHandler not fired after device restart #97646
  • JIT: checked/release diffs #97638
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors tests timing out under DOTNET_JITMinOpts=1 on x86 #97629
    9.0.0
  • Unnecessary buffer allocations when writing base64 values with `Utf8JsonWriter`. #97628
    Future

Closed

  • Misinterpretation of VT_INT/UINT in new COM interop #97363
  • System.Text.Json source generators don't preserve nullability of object types in JsonSerializable attributes #97665
  • TE Plaintext regression on 80-cores Ampere #97659
  • JIT: LSRA loses track of anti-preferences #92586
    Future
  • SqlBytes.Stream should consider overriding Span Read/Write methods #69921
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses() returns truncated 15 char string on macOS #52860
    Future
  • Debugging Browser app fails with [object Object] error with Avalonia 11.0.7. #97663
  • DateTime.ParseExact in .NET8 on Linux fails to parse date strings which were parsed with .NET7 #97627
  • Mono Runtime Error in Blazor WASM App when using IL Weaving #97377
  • Property duplication on overriding property with [JsonPropertyName] #97648
  • System.Text.Json silent null on List<> when respecting CS8618 #97635
  • Directory.EnumerateFiles on Linux recurses infinitely with bad symlinks #97123
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'emitVerifyEncodable(ins, size, dstReg, srcReg)' during 'Generate code' #97587
    9.0.0
  • JsonDocument JsonSerializer.Deserialize does not match JsonDocument.Parse for null root elements #97323
    Future
  • [browser] InterpPgoTests.FirstRunGeneratesTableAndSecondRunLoadsIt #97597
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose span-based `char.[Try]Parse` publicly #97598

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: don't ask for all write barrer helpers for AOT #97677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add the barebones support for using embedded masking with AVX512 #97675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Unrestored/UnrestoredTypeKey flags #97674
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix stability of OrderByDescending.Last #97672
    area-System.Linq
  • JIT: Remove optLoopCompactionFixupFallThrough #97670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] dispatch across threads via emscripten #97669
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove fgReplaceSwitchJumpTarget; increase usage of fgReplaceJumpTarget #97664
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Put scalar stack args with sign extension #97662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][llvm] Avoid linking a bblock ending with a NOT_REACHABLE with … #97660
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • For Debug, make sure we use right register selection heuristics to match with Release #97657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • adjust ownership of infrastructure-mono #97655
    area-Meta
  • reduce System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests noise in log files #97654
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [browser] improve behavior after exit, better docs #97651
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][interp] Fix inlining of ldarga #97650
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_DA_4A to IF_SVE_DC_3A group #97645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add separate properties for keep-in-sync versions #97643
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME in objectnative.cpp to QCall #97641
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add sudo to dmesg call in test run template #97624
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Pow, Exp2, Exp10, Cbrt #97623
    area-System.Numerics

Merged

  • Clarify comments around VT_INT and VT_UINT #97671
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Update CODEOWNERS #97673
    area-Meta
  • Switch WindowsSpecificBehavior host tests to pre-built assets #97586
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Split FeatureSwitchManager #97626
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace SPKI hashing with a managed implementation #97559
    area-System.Security
  • [NativeAOT] Remove dead ASM code #97636
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: initial support for reinforcement learning of CSE heuristic #96880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • StreamOnSqlBytes Read/Write on Spans #86674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Add missing space in PeriodicTimer.cs #97658
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enhance OSX's ProcessManager to extract process names from their paths #96287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Call String.Contains(char) from String.Contains(string) for single-char literals #97632
    area-System.Runtime
  • updating area ownership within mono and coreclr #97571
    area-Meta
  • Optimize BigInteger.CompareTo() #96835
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Late cast expansion: more improvements #2 #97480
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize threshold of BigInteger.Parse #97101
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Update "type-" to "type-safe" #97107
    documentation, area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix inlining of ldarga #97553
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Replumb TensorPrimitives.ConvertToHalf/Single to be on operator plan #97608
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Remove most fgConnectFallThrough calls #97488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] send cancel to abandoned threads with event loop during mono_exit #97441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove some loop flags #97314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • handle null value when deserializing JsonDocument #97596
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix GT_XCHG for byte on x86 #97593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude tests for Apple platforms on hybrid mode #97550
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Format System.Runtime ref assembly sources #97609
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Fix compilation error with generic type attributes #97613
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Enable Windows runs of AddressSanitizer #95758
    area-Infrastructure
  • Parse CallConvSwift in CoreCLR/NativeAOT #96707
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives shift and rotate operators #97361
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Update constant prop to only consider certain hwintrinsics #97616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix DangerousAddRef usage #97394
    area-System.Security
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add basic Vector3 SIMD intrinsics #97416
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Code coverage for Server-side OCSP stapling #97099
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add tests for Task.WhenAll #93619
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] change the branch's disasm-format. #96229
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Establish loop invariant base case based on IR #97182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] ARM: Implement the EABI #97604
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Generalize `optSetPreheaderWeight` #96843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert fast path of ValueType.GetHashCode to managed #97590
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use highest thread priority in linux #89848
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse(powerOfTen) #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Update TODOs for RiscV64 Machine and Architecture in Crossgen2 #97021
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Share unified UTF-8/16 parsing with BigInteger #95402
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize Interlocked.CompareExchange use in Task #93953
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #97074
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Test TotalOrderIeee754ComparerTests: Fix NFloat - NaN testcases for RISC-V #97340
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono] Enable NativeToManaged wrappers to get compiled with LLVM #96910
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Make some Span methods NonVersionable #94258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Add a disabled-by-default loop peeling phase #97517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix errors in crosgen2 for risc-v #97368
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Test] test only #97614
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use DivRem in Decimal.DecCalc #97619
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
